name: Truck Driver 3D: Offroad
description:
The best truck driver is back.
Are you ready to become the best truck driver here ?
Are you ready for realistic and exciting driving experience ?
Ambitious 3D graphics, realistic vehicle physics, excellent environments are waiting you.

Here are the new features that will excite you :

* 5 different environments with excellent eye catching animation and graphics.
* Narrow and ramp roads which looks impossible to climb
* Snowy , rainy , foggy day and night weather conditions and different weather conditions prepared for every levels
* Animals around roads
* interactive vehicles with the weather conditions
* 5 different type trucks and 10 different type trailer
* Advanced physics engine designed for vehicles
* Impossible tasks with double trailers
